body: This change isâ€‚[](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/830)

comment_regular_data.body: Isn't this the logo of your new Universal Tox Client?

Nope, I'm just trying to rebrand Tox to make it more appealing for new users, and the old logo is too ''sharp''. My new Universal client just use that new logo because I'd like to avoid to switch later and introduce confusion
Why are there playstation buttons in the background?
Those are just squares/circles/triangles Guy xD. I tought it would be prettier than a simple dark, and more original than the ''gradient hype''.. ðŸ˜‚

Those are generally associated with gaming, so I'm not sure what message the logo is trying to convey. That Tox is a chat application for gamers? That can't be right though.

I'd also be careful with using the playstation buttons to avoid any possible lawsuits with Sony.

I'm also happy with the current branding and I don't think our current branding is causing any issues. Making new branding is like fixing something that is not broken.

Nice logo! I would miss the current icon, but this one is pretty cool too. We need to hear feedback from more people. @SkyzohKey why do you think Tox needs rebranding? What else would it involve except changing the logo?

I can't focus my own time on this branding business right now, so I can't drive or join this discussion. I personally need to focus on getting the various coding projects in a mergeable state. Unless someone wants to drive this, I'm going to close these branding and "come join our yet another non-tox communication medium" PRs for the time being and we can revisit it in the future.
@SkyzohKey feel free to continue driving the discussion with the community, but there seems to be no consensus for now, so I'm closing this PR for the time being.
